title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ian Smith & Rob Smith | 7/28/20
description:
Atilis Gym co-owner Ian Smith gives the latest updates in his battle against government tyranny after he was arrested for refusing to close down. The Democrats’ insane grilling of Attorney General Barr is a new low. “Always a Soldier” author Rob Smith explains why coming out as conservative was harder than coming out as gay.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
